What's the difference between contractor and employee?

Great question! Here are the key differences:

**Employee:**
• You control how/when work is done
• Provide equipment & training
• Deduct taxes from pay
• Eligible for benefits

**Contractor:**
• They control their work methods
• Use their own tools
• Handle their own taxes
• No benefits required

**Risk:** Misclassifying can lead to penalties.

**Need help deciding?** Tell me about the role and I can guide you on the best classification.
